title: Relationship between national and state government

content.question: Directions: Suggested time - 25 minutes. Respond to all parts of the question. It is suggested that you take a few minutes to plan and outline each answer. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.The framers of the Constitution devised a federal system of government that affected the relationship between the national and state governments. Compare state sovereignty under the Articles of Confederation and under the Constitution.Explain how each of the following has been used to expand the power of the federal government over the states. Commerce clauseMandatesExplain how each of the following has played a role in the devolution of power from the national government to the states. Block grantsSupreme Court decisions
